title: Decade of Love 70's - 25 Top Love Songs in 1970's Vol 1&2 -
description:
This is a two-volume series entitled Decade of Love and released by Imperial House. It is a collection of top love songs from the 1970's, and was released in an original volume and a Volume 2. The original volume has 20 songs (the first 20 tracks), and the Volume 2 has 10 songs, but 5 are repeated. The new Volume 2 tracks are 21-25, and you can see the track listing on cover art embedded in tracks 21-25. This is a rare record collection (only found on collector's sites on the internet), but is sure to please.

1. Hollies - He Ain't Heavy He's My Brother 
2. Temptations - Just My Imagination (Running Away With Me) 
3. Gladys Knight And The Pips - Best Thing That Ever Happened To Me 
4. Nilsson - Without You 
5. B.J. Thomas - Raindrops Keep Fallin' On My Head 
6. Charlie Rich - The Most Beautiful Girl 
7. Sammi Smith - Help Me Make It Through The Night 
8. Mac Davis - Baby Don't Get Hooked On Me 
9. Morris Albert - Feelings 
10. Minnie Riperton - Lovin' You 
11. Daryl Hall & John Oates - She's Gone 
12. Dorothy Moore - Misty Blue 
13. Eric Carmen - All By Myself 
14. Judy Collins - Send In The Clowns 
15. Kenny Nolan - I Like Dreamin' 
16. Rita Coolidge - We're All Alone 
17. Paul Davis - I Go Crazy 
18. Jennifer Warnes - Right Time Of The Night 
19. Smokey Robinson - Cruisin' 
20. Peaches & Herb - Reunited
21. Dionne Warwick - I'll Never Love This Way Again
22. Robert John - Sad Eyes
23. Gino Vannelli - I Just Wanna Stop
24. Michael Johnson - Bluer Than Blue
25. Al Stewart - Year Of The Cat

All songs are MP3's in 320kbps format, which strikes a balance between high sound quality and the universal compatibility of the MP3 format. Please help these rare gems stay alive!
